website_summaries.verdict: For riders 5-foot-6 and larger, no other option on our list will do – constructed with older kids and riders who are kids at heart in mind
pros: Stands out from the rest of the pack for its 24-inch wheels that make it the perfect choice for older kids and even adults who want to pursue BMX riding
Though surprisingly lightweight, the rugged build is made for action
cons: Not suited for young or short kids
but a good choice for those ready to graduate to a larger model

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a 13 year old who had never rode a bike before and we successfully taught him how to ride on this. Looks like it will last long and it’s nice and lightweight with good tires. Because it’s a race bike it comes with a plastic seat that you will need to upgrade for comfort if not using for racing specifically. It also doesn’t come with a kickstand but all in all still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chookolingo

customer_reviews.title: IT'S NOT RED!
customer_reviews.text: This bike is suppossed to be red and it's not even close... it's orange! I ordered for my son's birthday and it was too late to return even though his favorite color is red.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: pretty great overall
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike to ride to work which is not very far about a mile and a half and its great for me the only thing I changed was the seat which was really easy and quick. other than that its a great bike and I'm sure it would handle well on the track.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb mumford

customer_reviews.title: A bike that has neither a kickstand nor a seat!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really annoyed that this bicycle does not have a proper seat - just a plastic piece where a seat should be. I went out an ordered a $40 bike seat only to find upon arrival that it doesn't fit. My 10-year-old has had this bike for 3 weeks now as we are trying to figure it all out and it's unrideable. In addition, there's no kickstand. Aren't these pieces STANDARD for a bicycle??
customer_reviews.author: Sgeorge

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bike!!
customer_reviews.text: Very fun to ride no complaints at all it comes with attachable reflectors and a chain guard which is very convenient as well as some tools to adjust the stem on the bike easy to assemble only had to attach stem and bike handle pedals and front wheel
customer_reviews.author: Charles Bushere

customer_reviews.title: IT'S CHEAP !!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this item. It's made with very cheap parts. I only had this bike for two days and the handle bar neck piece broke, and what's worst I could have seriously hurt myself. DON'T BUY THIS BIKE
customer_reviews.author: Mansour

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for the price. Most of the components are cheap, but it's a nice platform for a build on.
customer_reviews.author: frankie_zee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bike
customer_reviews.text: If your hitting the bmx track for the first time or riding the neighborhood with the kids these mx 24 are perfect . Good for mom and Dad or a larger teen. Decent weight for it size. Tires had no air so have a way to air them .
customer_reviews.author: Mark smith

customer_reviews.title: Color is Red-orange
customer_reviews.text: I bought one five years ago, same model through Amazon and gave it hell! (Still have it) Very durable and light..I Love this bike
customer_reviews.author: pat s.

customer_reviews.title: Great bmx for a 13 year old and a 40 year old to cruise on
customer_reviews.text: Very light bike should be perfect for my son beginner bmx rider. I have the PL 26 inch redline on the way for me to cruise around on.
customer_reviews.author: Andy garcia

customer_reviews.title: If you like tiny hard seats this is for you
customer_reviews.text: The seat is awful it is so hard and small that it’s impossible to sit on for more than 30 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Niko
